structuralFindings.rationale: Based on existing specimen classification. New observations from earnings/research session.

sources.name: Open Arena internal AI platform with 85%+ employee adoption
sources.notes: Open Arena internal AI platform with 85%+ employee adoption

summary: Open Arena internal AI platform with 85%+ employee adoption: Thomson Reuters has established Open Arena, an internal AI platform with over 85% employee adoption across the organization. More than 300 AI use cases are currently in development across the company. AI-enabled products at 28% of ACV and growing — CoCounsel, deep research, agentic features: GenAI-enabled products represented 28% of annualized contract value (ACV) by Q4, up from 24% the prior quarter. Products include Westlaw Advantage, CoCounsel Legal, CoCounsel for Tax and Audit. Deep r AI productivity displacement — $19M severance in Q4, $20M more in 2026: CEO Steve Hasker described initiatives to 'reimagine how we work.' Severance expenses totaled $19M in Q4 2025, with $10M expected in Q1 2026 and approximately $10M remaining through Q2-Q4 2026. CFO Mi Measurable AI productivity gains in customer support and content operations: Customer support: 15% reduction in average handle time and 10% increase in first-call resolution. Content operations: 25% acceleration in U.S. content delivery to Westlaw.
